title: The Complete Guide to Digital Painting Vol 1 - 2008  UK
description:
The Complete Guide to Digital Painting Vol 1 - 2008  UK

260 Pages | True PDF | English | 49 MB 


This is the ultimate art package for people wanting to start digital art, or those looking to extend their skills. We have dedicated tutorials on turning photos into art, where the brushes take colour and shape information from the source photo. If you're more confident, use the tutorials that begin with a line drawing and see how to apply layers of digital paint to build up a masterpiece. We also delve into the arena of traditional art. Included in this book are Inspiring Corel Painter tutorials and features, Over 250 pages of art techniques and digital creativity, Learn how to re-create an artists style, Composition, perspective, light and shade and lots more!
